sentences.text: Exits normally when closing in the panel.
Versions of packages deluge-gtk depends on:

ii  deluge-commo 1.2.3+git20100712.0b609bf-1 bittorrent client written in Pytho
ii  librsvg2-com 2.26.3-1                    SAX-based renderer library for SVG
ii  notification 0.5.0-2                     daemon to displays passive pop-up 
ii  python       2.6.6-3+squeeze1            interactive high-level object-orie
ii  python-glade 2.17.0-4                    GTK+ bindings: Glade support
ii  python-notif 0.1.1-2+b2                  Python bindings for libnotify
ii  python-suppo 1.0.10                      automated rebuilding support for P
ii  xdg-utils    1.0.2+cvs20100307-2         desktop integration utilities from
ii  python-pygame          1.8.1release-2+b1 SDL bindings for games development

Exits normally when closing in
> the panel.
are you still able to reproduce this?

Could you please attach relevant
messages shown when launching deluge from terminal (with `-L info` or
maybe higher).
When I exit deluge, it hangs, and I must kill it
Versions of packages deluge depends on:

ii  deluge-gtk   1.2.3+git20100712.0b609bf-1 bittorrent client written in Pytho
ii  python       2.6.6-3+squeeze1            interactive high-level object-orie
> When I exit deluge, it hangs, and I must kill it

> On Wed, Dec 8, 2010 at 5:35 AM, Colin Williams <discord@uw.edu> wrote:
>> When I exit deluge, it hangs, and I must kill it
>> Versions of packages deluge depends on:

>> ii deluge-gtk  1.2.3+git20100712.0b609bf-1 bittorrent client written in Pytho
>> ii python    2.6.6-3+squeeze1      interactive high-level object-orie
>>
> Maybe these warnings are the source of the bug?

I uploaded packages versioned as 1.2.3+git20100712.0b609bf-2 at the
following url, they include a patch backported from deluge 1.3.1, as
suggested by upstream.

Would you be so glad to test them and let me
know?
Thanks for your work and the backport, closes #602613 for me.
Attached logs before and after updating.

We believe that the bug you reported is fixed in the latest version of
deluge, which is due to be installed in the Debian FTP archive:

A summary of the changes between this version and the previous one is
attached.
Thank you for reporting the bug, which will now be closed.

If you
have further comments please address them to 602613@bugs.debian.org,
and the maintainer will reopen the bug report if appropriate.
Cristian Greco <cristian@regolo.cc> (supplier of updated deluge package)
(This message was generated automatically at their request;

if you
believe that there is a problem with it please contact the archive
administrators by mailing ftpmaster@debian.org)

Binary: deluge-common deluged deluge-console deluge-web deluge-gtk deluge deluge-webui deluge-torrent
Architecture: source all
deluge     - bittorrent client written in Python/PyGTK
deluge-common - bittorrent client written in Python/PyGTK (common files)
deluge-console - bittorrent client written in Python/PyGTK (console ui)
deluge-gtk - bittorrent client written in Python/PyGTK (GTK+ ui)
deluge-torrent - bittorrent client (gtk ui transitional package)
deluge-web - bittorrent client written in Python/PyGTK (web ui)
deluge-webui - bittorrent client (web ui transitional package)
deluged    - bittorrent client written in Python/PyGTK (daemon)

- Upstream commit 8c36830 backported from the 1.3.x release:
       "fix hang on quit". (Closes: #602613)

title: deluge-gtk hangs on exit in the GUI, exits normally when closing in the panel
